document_data.name: ''Lathander's Favor''
document_data.mainbody: '''''Lathander's Favor''''' was a type of [[enchanted]] [[amulet]] created by the [[Church of Lathander]] and sold in the Morninglord's temples.
document_data.Powers: Each of these amulets was ensorcelled with Lathander's divine magics allowing the wearer to receive the deity's ''[[bless]]ing'' once per day.
document_data.History: In the late 14{{th}} century [[DR]], ''Lathander's Favors'' were sold in the [[Morningstar Haven]], temple of Lathander in [[Westgate]].
